TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
> 
> I have to hand my stuff over too, I can't work on it either

Why not?
Alcantara Space Center,Brazil

Triston, I understand what you're going through, I'm in a similar situation right now, (I have a lot of theater) and my grades are kinda low. If you need help, just PM me ad we can talk.

Josh

> 
> Why not?

I have so much school work and I'm not an expirenced modder, it makes stuff very difficlut

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> If everyone is leaving. we will only do whats at the Kennedy space center. we cannot make everything on that list if no one is willing to help and contribute.. if your working on something not at the cape please finish it and try your best to work on a launch site/ building at the cape. this is getting very over whelming for me. I'm feeling rather depleted......
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> with school and everything..... I'm no longer able to work on this or any other mods. I'm very sorry but I'm very sick and I have a very low grade in school. I hope everyone understands

I understand what your going through, I know what's going on. Hope something continues
Holidays are just coming up for me. I'm working on my launchpad.

> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> with school and everything..... I'm no longer able to work on this or any other mods. I'm very sorry but I'm very sick and I have a very low grade in school. I hope everyone understands

Hey, I think it would be better if you take a break from this for a bit and focus on getting your school stuff dealt with! School is more important than this!
that's the plan......
so it seems that theres a lot of hate now that I have said this so I'm going to lock this thread

> 
> so it seems that theres a lot of hate now that I have said this so I'm going to lock this thread

Please no, you should put it on github so others can work on it.
I will leave it up to liquid hype

> 
> I will leave it up to liquid hype

If I can have the right to not get mean messages. And if we get more people to help , I will work in the background....

> 
> If I can have the right to not get mean messages. And if we get more people to help , I will work in the background....

nods understandingly\*

Everybody calm down. If people feel like they need to focus on their personal lives, that is completely understandable. School, work, family and friends is always a priority over any mod.

With that being said, I am not going anywhere and will keep this mod alive. I've talked to Kartoffelkuchen, and he is still going to help out.

This mod was my idea from the beginning, I just gave Triston the go-ahead to open up this thread. If he needs to take some time off, I will step in for the time being.

I am currently busy with a fairly big update for Real Scale Launch Vehicles, which will include a few version of Ariane 5, ATV, new textures, new engine models, Career mode and Stock balancing and a bunch of other changes.

Once I am done with the update, I will focus more on this mod and try to get some kind of a pre-release out there.

On a side note; If anyone has extensive modeling experience and wants to contribute to this mod. Feel free to send me a PM ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Any and all help is appreciated.

Thanks for understanding.... I over reacted a little. I just need a little brake. I'm not going anywhere.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

And also I know my models are basic but I have been modeling since I was 10.. But with family issues I had to move to new York and I didn't have a PC/laptop. I moved back down here in 2013 So I forgot everything about modeling......
I know some very limited modeling, however I kinda got grounded and won't get my computer back for a week... After the Martian has a release I'll get working on this again
Does this actually replace the models of the KSC or just add a new one somewhere else. Like in kerbinside.
I'm working on a plugin to change them but I think you already can in the new kerbal konstructs

that's where I left it.
n you didnt . go ahead and send me it
